name: Murder She Grow't: Demo
description:
Murder She Grow't is a game about growing up. Murder She Grow't is a game about being different. Murder She Grow't is a game about trying to understand what is happening to you and your family.

Murder She Grow't is a game about your plants dying, and figuring out why.

Murder She Grow't is a gay plant game, coming to you soon! In the meantime, we have created a demo to introduce you all to the world of MSG! In this demo, you play Nat, 18, as she uses her laptop after a long day of chaos, mainly thanks to her younger sister Twiggy. Explore the world, chat with Effy and play Twiggy's games!

-SOCIAL MEDIA LINKS-

Website: Murder She Grow't Website || Impulsive Games Website

-Developer Note-

If you are having issues where the game crashes, you may need to install the UE4 redistributables. They can be found under:

MSG_Demo->Engine->Extras->Redist->en-us

Run the "UE4PrereqSetup_x64" and let it install any prerequisites. If your game is still crashing, please reach out to us on Discord or Twitter!
